identified-content.object.title: MASTERPIECE THEATER (TV PROGRAM)
CHRONICLE (TIMES COLUMN)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

block.p: ALISTAIR COOKE , DIANA RIGG and JOHN HURT were among those who celebrated the 20th anniversary of "Masterpiece Theater" in Washington on Monday night. The Mobil Corporation, which underwrites the PBS series, was the host for a dinner that drew the capital's culture crowd, along with many of the actors responsible for the series' 25 Emmy Awards.

The Washingtonians included JENNIFER LAWSON , PBS's programming chief, and DAVID H. LEVY , the new director of the Corcoran Gallery. In his after-dinner remarks, Mr. Cooke predicted that if he was remembered at all, he would be best recalled by fans of "Sesame Street" as "Alistair Cookie, the Cookie Monster of 'Monsterpiece Theater.' "

ALISTAIR COOKE , DIANA RIGG and JOHN HURT were among those who celebrated the 20th anniversary of "Masterpiece Theater" in Washington on Monday night. The Mobil Corporation, which underwrites the PBS series, was the host for a dinner that drew the capital's culture crowd, along with many of the actors responsible for the series' 25 Emmy Awards.

The Washingtonians included JENNIFER LAWSON , PBS's programming chief, and DAVID H. LEVY , the new director of the Corcoran Gallery. In his after-dinner remarks, Mr. Cooke predicted that if he was remembered at all, he would be best recalled by fans of "Sesame Street" as "Alistair Cookie, the Cookie Monster of 'Monsterpiece Theater.' "
